item.title: Showgunners coming to PS5, Xbox Series, PS4, and Xbox One on February 19, 2026
item.content:encoded:
• PS4
  • PS5
  • Xbox One
  • Xbox Series

Pre-orders include free upgrade to Platinum Edition.

Klabater will release Artificer-developed turn-based tactical game Showgunners for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, and Xbox One on February 19, 2026 for $34.99, the publisher announced. Pre-orders are available now via PlayStation Store, and an Xbox demo is available now via Microsoft Store.

Showgunners first launched for PC via Steam and GOG on May 2, 2023.

Console pre-orders will be upgraded to the ‚ÄúPlatinum Edition‚Äù at no additional charge. It includes the following content:

  • A copy of Showgunners
  • Downloadable content
    • Neon Justice ‚Äì A striking costume for Scarlett, exclusive to Platinum Edition.
    • Costumes and Weapons Pack‚Äì Three unique costumes and two weapon reskins for Scarlett.
    • Cyber Runner ‚Äì A futuristic costume for Scarlett, exclusive to PlayStation pre-orders.

Here is an overview of the game, via Klabater:

About

In a dystopian future where corporations rule, a brutal reality show is the hottest entertainment property in town! You play as Scarlett Martillo, a contestant out for revenge. To win, you must navigate dangerous urban arenas packed with lethal traps and face off against hordes of heavily-armed psychopaths.

Key Features

  • Pure Turn-Based Tactical Combat ‚Äì Each stage in Showgunners has been hand-crafted to create a curated, turn-based tactical gameplay experience, heightened with the inclusion of a diabolical show director that can hinder Scarlett or help her opponents depending on your performance. This dynamic level design ensures that no two levels play the same way and keep players thinking tactically. Showgunners has been built to challenge and delight players, whether they‚Äôre a turn-based tactical game initiate or a long-time fan of the genre!
  • Fight Alongside Unique Characters ‚Äì Scarlett won‚Äôt be fighting alone. As the story progresses, players will recruit new partners that can turn the tide of battle in all kinds of exciting ways. Upgrade your characters by spending talent points in their unique skill trees and outfitting them with weapons bought at a shop or earned during battle. Hidden challenges within each chapter can unlock more allies, legendary weapons, and helpful items, so be sure to keep an eye out!
  • Face the Competition ‚Äì Players will need to navigate an obstacle course of deadly traps and lethal puzzles in real-time, but be prepared for an ambush at any corner. Psychopathic enemies like the Ogre and the Ronin aren‚Äôt the only deadly elements you‚Äôll need to overcome. Combat scenarios are peppered with unique environmental hazards, from ticking time bombs to runaway trains. There is never a dull moment in Showgunners!
  • Become a Star of the Show ‚Äì Gain fame by avoiding death, surviving rounds, and eliminating your enemies with gruesome panache. The more you succeed, the more fans you earn; your growing fame will yield increasingly beneficial sponsorship deals.

Watch a new trailer below.

Consoles Announce Trailer



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/12/showgunners-coming-to-ps5-xbox-series-ps4-and-xbox-one-on-february-19-2026
item.dc:creator: invalid@example.com (ResetEra_Newsbot

item.title: Zero36 Studio and CCG Lab announce Star Wars digital collectible card game for PC, iOS, and Android
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • Smartphone

From Zero36 Studio and CCG Lab.

ByteDance subsidiary Zero36 Studio and CCG Lab have announced a collaboration with Lucasfilm Games to develop a new Star Wars digital collectible card game for PC, iOS, and Android.

‚ÄúThe opportunity to develop a game for the Star Wars galaxy is a profound honor for our studio,‚Äù said Zero36 Studio head Hades Lu in a press release. ‚ÄúOur team is dedicated to creating an immersive journey worthy of the Star Wars legacy, one we truly believe will capture the hearts of fans across the galaxy.‚Äù

CCG Lab CEO Cory Jones added, ‚ÄúAs a trailblazing game development studio, CCG Lab brings a deep well of creativity and passion to this project. Our mission is to craft an experience that captures the thrill, adventure, and heart of Star Wars‚Äîa game that feels instantly familiar yet constantly surprising. Together with Zero36 Studio and Lucasfilm Games, we‚Äôre creating something truly exciting for players and fans alike‚Äîan experience that celebrates the joy of play in the galaxy far, far away.‚Äù

Lucasfilm Games vice president and general manager Douglas Reilly said, ‚ÄúThe Star Wars galaxy, with its wide roster of iconic characters, is a perfect fit for a collectible card game. We‚Äôre confident that the unique expertise of Zero36 Studio and CCG Lab makes them the right teams to deliver a Star Wars card game that brings the saga to life in a new way for the genre.‚Äù

Further information was not announced.



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/12/zero36-studio-and-ccg-lab-announce-star-wars-digital-collectible-card-game-for-pc-ios-and-android

item.title: Fairy Tail: Dungeons coming to Switch on January 7, 2026 alongside major update
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • Switch

Enjoy a refreshed, upgraded gameplay experience.

Publisher Kodansha and developer ginolabo will release a Switch version of roguelike deckbuilder Fairy Tail: Dungeons on January 7, 2025 alongside a major update for the PC version, the companies announced.

Fairy Tail: Dungeons first launched for PC via Steam on August 26, 2024.

‚ÄúWe wanted our first major content update to be massive,‚Äù said game creator gino in a press release. ‚ÄúFans of the series will enjoy a refreshed, upgraded gameplay experience. The Nintendo Switch is perfect for quick dungeon-diving sessions, and we look forward to welcoming a new console community into the action!‚Äù

Here is an overview of the Switch version and major update, via Kodansha:

Whether a first-time player on Nintendo Switch or returning for new challenges on PC, form a tenacious trio, build a deck of magic cards, and navigate an underground maze filled with treasures and secrets. Battle brutes blocking the path forward in strategic, turn-based combat. Play cards in a specific order to activate Magic Chains for a massive damage boost, and upgrade cards and skillsets after each run.

Fairy Tail: Dungeons‚Äò first major content update since PC launch invites five new heroes to monster-filled dungeon dives, all unlockable through gameplay: Gajeel, Juvia, Mirajane, Laxus, and Gildarts. Countless new battle strategies await with the addition of over 200 amulets, over 170 magic cards, over 100 skills, 50 Labyrinth quests, 30 monsters, and 20 items.

Return to the depths with the newly added Special Labyrinth Exploration. Test skills with higher difficulty levels in the Labyrinth and Abyssal Conquest modes, or focus on the story in the new casual mode. Fuse duplicate cards together with the new card upgrade system, and enjoy quality-of-life updates like user interface improvements, additional control schemes, and much more.

And here is the bullet point summary of the update:

New Content and New Features

  • New Content: ‚ÄúEnter Special Labyrinth‚Äù ‚Äì After clearing the main story, it will be added to the guild menu.
  • New Feature: ‚ÄúExpedition Records‚Äù ‚Äì Strategy guides for each labyrinth and each character are available.
  • New Difficulty Level ‚Äì Added to ‚ÄúLabyrinth‚Äù and ‚ÄúGrand Clash‚Äù. Solved by fulfilling specific conditions
  • Card Upgrade ‚Äì When you obtain the same card again, you can choose to upgrade it.
  • Miscellaneous ‚Äì Added TIPS display and Casual Mode.

Expanding Content Volume and Enhancing Comfort

  • Playable Characters ‚Äì Expanded from five to 10 units.
  • New Features ‚Äì Over 50 Labyrinth Quests / Over 170 Magic Cards / Over 100 Skills /Over 200 Amulets / Over 30 Monsters / Over 20 Items / New Event Added.
  • Tomes of Remembrance ‚Äì Expand the save slots from four to six..
  • Miscellaneous ‚Äì Minor feature enhancements and fixes for existing bugs.

View a new set of screenshots at the gallery.

Screenshots

  • ‚ùÆ
  • ‚ùØ


https://www.gematsu.com/2025/12/fairy-tail-dungeons-coming-to-switch-on-january-7-2026-alongside-major-update

item.title: Cozy hand-painted adventure game Seina: A Tale of Spirits announced for PS5, Xbox Series, Switch 2, and PC
item.content:encoded:
POFUPOFU STUDIOS has announced cozy hand-painted adventure game Seina: A Tale of Spirits for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, Switch 2, and PC (Steam). It will launch in 2026.

Here is an overview of the game, via POFUPOFU STUDIOS:

About

Seina: A Tale of Spirits is a cozy, hand-painted adventure inspired by Japanese nature, folklore, and traditional values. Players explore a watercolor world filled with peaceful forests, ancient shrines, and friendly spirits, discovering a gentle narrative through non-verbal storytelling, expressions, and atmospheric details. Designed for relaxation and reflection, the game invites players to wander at their own pace, uncovering small secrets and quiet moments of beauty.

Story

Players follow Mika, a young girl searching for her missing cat who accidentally wanders into a serene spirit realm. This world reflects memories held by nature itself, shrines forgotten by time, paths shaped by ancient folklore and gentle spirits who guide or observe her journey.

As Mika explores deeper, she uncovers small stories hidden in the world: places where past and present quietly overlap, revealing themes of companionship, kindness, and respect for nature. Instead of confronting danger, Mika connects with the environment and its spirits, learning how everything in this world is intertwined. The narrative unfolds softly through discovery, offering an emotional journey built on subtle details and moments of tranquility.

  • ‚ùÆ
  • ‚ùØ

Gameplay

Seina: A Tale of Spirits focuses on peaceful exploration and intimate discoveries. Players wander through hand-painted locations, interact with friendly animal spirits, and solve light, accessible puzzles. Storytelling happens through gestures, environmental clues, and visual expression rather than dialogue or traditional cutscenes.

Each area encourages players to slow down, observe, and explore at their own rhythm. The world reacts gently to Mika‚Äôs presence‚Äîspirits respond with curiosity, shrines reveal fragments of memory, and small secrets emerge for those who take the time to look.

Key Features

  • Hand-Painted Watercolor World ‚Äì Explore environments created in soft watercolor tones, inspired by Japanese nature and folklore.
  • Cozy, Stress-Free Exploration ‚Äì No combat, timers, or pressure. Just peaceful wandering and simple discoveries.
  • Friendly Animal Spirits ‚Äì Meet glowing, charming spirits with unique personalities that enrich the journey.
  • Light, Accessible Puzzles ‚Äì Designed for all ages, adding gentle interaction without disrupting the game‚Äôs calm atmosphere.
  • Non-Verbal Storytelling ‚Äì The narrative unfolds through expressions, gestures, and atmospheric details rather than dialogue or text-heavy scenes.
  • Heartfelt Inspiration ‚Äì A personal journey crafted by a solo woman developer, shaped by real experiences traveling through Japan.

Watch the announcement trailer below. View the first screenshots at the gallery.

Announce Trailer



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/12/cozy-hand-painted-adventure-game-seina-a-tale-of-spirits-announced-for-ps5-xbox-series-switch-2-and-pc
